Class BoundedBuffer

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • BoundedBuffer

  • public class BoundedBuffer
extends java.util.Observable
    Class for Synchronized buffer. Writer puts strings in a circular buffer, modifies it and returns to reader.
    Author:
    Linus Forsberg
